author: Barbara Jane Reyes
text: With razorblade eyes The Filipina is most sincere
And will make a very good wife.
With animal teeth The Filipina is a loyal partner,
With splintered hands The Filipina is the total package,
Much more than meets the eye.
With ribcage unlocked The Filipina is not for you,
If you cannot handle her claws.
title: To Love as Aswang
